DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Oxpecker Data
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Each row represents a five minute observation of an individual mammal and associated number of red-billed (RBO) and yellow-billed oxpeckers (YBO). For each individual, general data (date, time, location) as well as specific data (group size, wound presence, demographics) are provided.
